resources.string: Bringing more colour into our lives.

Welcome to Arkyris!
 This is split up into two different sections, Arke and Iris. Arke for the public "entries" (this is what we call the colours you post), Iris is for the private entries. As for what each entry means, well, that can be whatever you want, whatever colour you are "feeling" at the time, and you can either let everyone know, or keep it private (and you can change this later if you so please!).
 Arke
 This shows everyone's public colour entries. You can add a public entry here by clicking the green circle in the bottom right corner. This will open up a colour picker. Select a colour from the wheel, change the brightness if you so prefer and click OK! This will post the colour publicly. Note: This will also post it to Iris, which is where your private entries are displayed. Your posts will always show in Iris, regardless of if they are public or private.
 Iris
 This shows your private entries. The way you post here is slightly different; click on the large circle in the centre of the screen which will open up the colour picker. Again, you can select a colour from the wheel, change the brightness and click OK, however it is not posted yet but the large circle will preview the desired colour for you. If this is to your liking, click the green button at the bottom of the screen, and you get the option to either make this entry public or private. You will then see this added to your entries at the top of the screen.
 Changing Public Visiblity of Entries
 Just go into Iris, find the entry you wish to amend and press down on it and hold for a second or so. You then get the option to make it private (if it is already public), and it will stop showing in Arke, or vice versa.
 Deleting Entries
 Similar to amending the visibility or entries, just go into Iris, find the entry you wish to amend, press down on it and choose the deletion option.
 Accounts
 You can go into settings, where you can change your password (make sure you remember what you changed it too!), or log out. If you choose to logout, you can all request that this is done across all your devices, and they will be logged out the next time the app is opened.
 Further Information
 Please check out https://github.com/Carkzis for more information on any planned updates to the app, or any other apps currently under development!
